<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>List Policy Compliance Standards</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/policy/compliance"}></MethodEndpoint>



Returns a list of compliance standards that Prisma Cloud supports and for each compliance standard, lists the supported sections.
